definition: point/dot/drop/speck/o'clock/point (in space or time)/to draw a dot/to check on a list/to choose/to order (food in a restaurant)/to touch briefly/to hint/to light/to ignite/to pour a liquid drop by drop/(old) one fifth of a two-hour watch 更[geng1]/dot stroke in Chinese characters/classifier for items
erhua variant of 一點|一点[yi1 dian3]
erhua variant of 差點|差点[cha4 dian3]
erhua variant of 差一點|差一点[cha4 yi1 dian3]
variant of 居民點|居民点[ju1 min2 dian3]
erhua variant of 快點|快点[kuai4 dian3]

sentences.english: The exchange rate fluctuates every day.
sentences.chinese: 今天的匯率比昨天稍微低一點兒。

sentences.english: I need some medicine for my cold.
sentences.chinese: 我想買點兒治感冒的藥。

sentences.english: He has had a bit of trouble, and I have to straighten it out for him.
sentences.chinese: 他遇到了點兒麻煩，我得替他把這事了結掉。

sentences.english: I'm feeling goose bumps now. I was having death threats, I never felt safe for 3 and a half years.
sentences.chinese: 有人恐嚇說要我的命，那三年半我沒有一點兒安全感。

sentences.english: I want to enroll in a driving school. Do you have any advice?
sentences.chinese: 我想報駕校。你能給我點兒建議嗎？

sentences.english: On the half way to the mountain, the tourists had a rest and snacked on some bread.
sentences.chinese: 在登山的途中，遊客們休息了會兒，吃了點兒麪包。

sentences.english: Frank, how about some bacon with your French toast ?
sentences.chinese: 弗蘭克，弄點兒鹹肉就着煎麪包片兒喫好不好？

sentences.english: Obviously, Cuiping was nervous and so her smile was not genuine.
sentences.chinese: 翠平顯然很緊張，笑聲一點兒也不好聽。

sentences.english: Iago . I bleed, sir; but not kill'd.
sentences.chinese: 伊阿古我不過流了點兒血，還沒有給他殺死。

sentences.english: Just based only on the food here.
So what else could China do with the money?
sentences.chinese: 中國還能拿這些錢來乾點兒什麼呢？

sentences.english: Could you please drive faster? I'm in a hurry.
sentences.chinese: 您能開快點兒嗎？我趕時間。

sentences.english: I walk slowly, but I never walk back.
sentences.chinese: 也許走得慢點兒，可我絕不會走回頭路。

sentences.english: In this aspect, I think, pater bags have the edge on plastic bags.
sentences.chinese: 我認爲在這方面紙袋要比塑料袋強一點兒。

sentences.english: and jump in leaves,there is no harm.
sentences.chinese: 在樹葉中跳躍，一點兒也不礙事。

sentences.english: She seems like a kook, but she is just grand, really.
sentences.chinese: 她看上去有點兒怪，不過她確實是個好人兒。

definition: It is said that ... (at the start of a narrative)/to discuss/to recount
to say again/to put off a discussion until later/moreover/what's more/besides
at the minimum/at the very least
still/still in progress/still more/yet/even more/in addition/fairly/passably (good)/as early as/even/also/else
mythical horse/Internet slang for 什麼|什么[shen2 me5]
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
we or us (including both the speaker and the person(s) spoken to)/(dialect) I or me/(dialect) (in a coaxing or familiar way) you/also pr. [za2 men5]
